room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Omg this was an amazing afternoon! We had a Groupon and went as a Family. We chose the Casino room and our guy was Phil. He explained everything and we were allowed to ask for hints from him. He gave just a little nudge to get us going. The clues were hard, sometimes a little too hard, which was awesome. We managed to escape with about 6 minutes to spare, and we are definitely going back!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: I went here for a team building event for work and had a great time. The place is located inside of the mall which I wasn't expecting, but it's easy to find. The staff was ready for us when we walked in and got all 30 or so of us situated in our rooms.The casino game was fun and very challenging and you feel like some sort of detective going through the clues. We ran out of time on the very last step so we were super close but didn't quite make it. I'd go again.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Rooms are challenging and themed well. 8 people in some of the rooms is a little crowded. I would recommend 6 if you can.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Had a great time here with my Mom for her birthday! It was very challenging and lots of fun. Will definitely do this again.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: It was a blast! Operation Casino was definitely a challenge. Seth was awesome. Thanks to all at Breakout that made our experience the best.
